text: Sharon Case (born February 9, 1971) is an American actress and a former model. At age 17, she began working as a model before getting into acting. She is best known for her roles on daytime soap operas. She played Dawn Winthrop in General Hospital. She also played Debbie Simon in As the World Turns. She played Sharon Newman on The Young and the Restless. Case was born in Detroit, Michigan. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Sharon Case
